translations: v．谴责，指责：公开表示强烈反对或不满。
· The environmentalist decries the destruction of the rainforest.
环保主义者谴责了破坏雨林的行为。

sentences.sentence: The organization also decries what it calls an "alarming amount" of fraud and abuse of state resources during the campaign period.
sentences.translation: 国际共和学会也谴责了在竞选阶段滥用国家资源的欺诈行为之多，达到令人吃惊的程度。

sentences.sentence: Meanwhile he decries lazy journalists who "make a living by reporting ceaseless tales of woe" from India; but these are a dying lot.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，他责难那些懒惰的印度记者“靠不断地报道不幸的故事营生”；但这些都很少见了。

sentences.sentence: This piece decries in exquisite verse the longing thoughts of any loving parent aging and fearful of lessons untaught to offsprings.
sentences.translation: 这首诗描写的是一位父亲对自己的孩子未来的焦虑和期盼。
